name: Aguayo Aerosports
about: Aguayo Aerosports, located at Spruce Creek Fly-In in Daytona Beach, Florida, is a specialized flight school dedicated to providing advanced aviation training. Founded by Alain Aguayo, the school focuses on Upset Prevention & Recovery Training (UPRT) and the sport of aerobatics. Our courses incorporate a methodical approach, emphasizing psychology, physiology, and advanced aircraft control. We offer a unique educational and informational platform for pilots seeking to enhance their skills and safety in the air. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Aguayo Aerosports is the ideal choice for those looking to elevate their flying capabilities. Contact us to start your training today.
